Seasons Of Code

Continuous integration for Virtual Labs    • Pushpdeep   

WnCC - Seasons of Code

Seasons of Code is a programme launched by WnCC along the lines of the Google Summer of Code. It provides one with an opprtunity to learn and participate in a variety of interesting projects under the mentorship of the very best in our institute.

  • Learn More

List of Projects

  • Scilab-Julia Interface
  • Scilab Video Player
  • Scilab server
  • Xcos on Web
  • Remote Triggered Virtual Lab

  • Common Drupal based theme for FOSSEE Websites
  • Develop GUI for OpenModelica using Python
  • SBHS Virtual lab server and website
  • Image Processing for Healthcare Research
  • To Create Dynamic Syllabus Matrix for Virtual Labs Community portal
  • Mapping Analytics from Virtual lab to edX
  • Continuous integration for Virtual Labs

  • Revive pythonFlu package for OpenFOAM

Continuous integration for Virtual Labs

• Pushpdeep   
• Web Development


Contact the Mentor: Join the FOSSEE Slack team using the iitb.ac.in email address.


Openings:
1

Stipend:
INR 20000

Virtual lab has started a new community based virtual lab development initiative. At present the team requires automation in lab source code testing and hosting process using git. Looking for an engineer who can help in automation of the Virtual lab testing and deployment to the development and production server using Git/GitLab CE

Requirements

Git, PHP, PostgreSQL , RESTful.

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of ITC (former STAB), we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
